results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/07]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1.The world on the move: President Pompidou in Africa - the French President’s visit to Niger and Chad. Growth of the Common Market - Britain, Ireland, Denmark and Norway join the European Economic Community. Concorde galore - the three Concordes meet in England. The Duke of Edinburgh takes the controls. Racing cars - the racing car show in Paris. Motion and life - a “Motion in art” exhibition. 2. Nijinsky, the heavenly buffoon - Maurice Bejart’s Ballet - the 20th Century Ballet’s new show.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/06]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The General de Gaulle Memorial - a small-scale model of the projected monument. results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/04]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Port installations - a new lock for heavy tankers at Le Havre. Electricity and life - an exhibition to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the French Electricity Administration. 2. Gien crockery - 150th anniversary of the Gien Crockery Works. 3. Artificial plant-breeding - hydroponic plant-growth for arid regions. 4. Tapestries - the story of David and Bathsheba. A unique set of tapestries.

results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The nativity of the master of Moulins - the Nativity painting of the Rolin museum in autumn. 2. results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/50]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The France Australia Rugby Match - France wins 18 to 9. The Parc des Princes - Paris’ new stadium nearing completion. The arts: Balthus - sketches by Balthus. Naum Gabo - sculptures and dynamic structures.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/47]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The 25th anniversary of UNESCO - President Pompidou at the 25th anniversary celebrations. French liqueurs - international press tour the large French Liqueur distilleries. Homage to a conductor - former French operatic conductor Henri Buser will soon be 100 years old. 2. The fight against pollution - the Plant Biology laboratory of the Grenoble Nuclear Research Center. 3. Stamps for General de Gaulle - a commemorative issue on the eve of de Gaulle’s death anniversary. 4. Paul Valery - at the French National Library, an exhibition on the occasion of the centenary of French poet, Paul Valery’s birth.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/45]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Fire fighting demonstration. 2. Fight against pollution in Paris with air cleaning towers. 3. 2nd phase of SP3000 oceanic sea saucer for observation and underwater photography. 4. Clock making exhibition from 15th century until 1971 plus factory tour showing techniques and most recently, quartz watches. 5. Paris biennial art show for under 35’s. 6. Homage to Picasso who is 90 in his home town and in the Louvre. President Pompidou and his wife open exhibition of some of Picasso’s paintings.
